Entries.default:
Searing hot winds rip across the dunes. You shield your face from the onslaught, but it's of little use - sand makes its way into every vulnerable little crevice it can find.

You spot a structure ahead.
Sand eddies about the open entrance to the Huana crypt, collecting in drifts against the walls. You step inside.
Up close, it appears to be the ruins of an ancient Huana building, perhaps a temple. An obscured entrance leads into a sand-covered hillside
You've no interest in suffering the sand storm any longer. You turn your back to the wind and return the way you came.
